author: Brett Jones

review: I chose this because it offered the best hardware for the price among its competition.  Most industry reviews pointed to the Roku 3 being more flexible but 85% of my needs are Amazon video and Netflix.  iTunes would have been nice but the Apple TV was otherwise the runt of the litter when I shopped.  I wanted a responsive box and this one delivers.  It feels obvious how this had the fastest internal hardware in the current generation.It is tiny, reliable, and easy to use.  Setup was cake.  I wish the voice input worked with other apps (e.g. Netflix) but that is a minor complaint.  It works like magic for Amazon content.I wanted a box to replace having to hook up my laptop to the bedroom TV for streaming and this did the trick.  I just ordered Amazon's new streaming stick to replace using a PS4 for streaming on another TV.  I'm curious to see how it compares for so much less money.The screen saver images are an unexpected bonus.  Those high-resolution nature images are very cool.
